name: Kraft Printed Food Delivery Paper Bags
subTitle: Eco-Friendly and Durable for Food Delivery
description: Engineered for the food delivery revolution‚Äîour sturdy, eco-friendly paper bags ensure your meals arrive fresh and in style.
highlights: ♻️ 100% Eco-Friendly — Made from recyclable, biodegradable kraft paper
📏 Custom Sizes Available — Fit your unique packaging needs
💪 Built for Daily Use — Strong 120 GSM paper holds up to 5kg
🖨️ Brandable Surface — Supports single-color or multi-color printing

assurance.title: Eco-Friendly Materials
assurance.desc: Made from recyclable and biodegradable kraft paper using food-safe ink and glue.

assurance.title: Pan-India Delivery Coordination
assurance.desc: We deliver across India through trusted third-party logistics partners. Shipping method and cost depend on product type, quantity, and location. We coordinate dispatch and provide tracking details to ensure a smooth and transparent delivery experience.

assurance.title: Quality Checked
assurance.desc: Each batch is inspected for strength, finish, and print clarity to meet consistent quality standards.

assurance.title: Made in India
assurance.desc: Proudly made in India using locally sourced materials to support regional suppliers and minimize environmental impact.

faqs.q: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ)?
faqs.a: Our MOQ varies by size and print type. For example, standard kraft paper bags with 1-color printing start at 500 pcs. Custom printed options may require higher MOQ.

faqs.q: Can I customize the design or print on the bags?
faqs.a: Yes. We support 1-color, 2-color, and full-color custom printing. You can share your artwork or consult our in-house design team for assistance.

faqs.q: Do you deliver across India?
faqs.a: Yes. We coordinate delivery across India via reliable logistics partners like VRL, DTDC, and Porter. Shipping charges depend on quantity and location.

faqs.q: What is the typical lead time for delivery?
faqs.a: Production usually takes 5‚Äì10 business days after design approval. Delivery timelines vary between 2‚Äì7 days depending on your city and selected shipping method.

faqs.q: Are your products eco-friendly?
faqs.a: Absolutely. Our paper bags are made from biodegradable kraft paper and use food-safe, water-based inks and adhesives.

faqs.q: Can I request samples before placing a bulk order?
faqs.a: Yes. Sample kits are available for a nominal fee, which is refundable upon bulk order confirmation. Contact our sales team to request one.

faqs.q: Are these paper covers food-safe?
faqs.a: Yes. They are made from virgin kraft paper that is safe for dry food packaging.

faqs.q: Do you offer bulk discounts?
faqs.a: Yes. Prices drop significantly at 100kg and 250kg slabs. Contact sales for volume-based quotes.

faqs.q: Can these covers be printed with branding?
faqs.a: This variant is unprinted, but custom printed covers are available under 'Custom Printed Paper Covers'.

faqs.q: How are the covers packed?
faqs.a: Each kg is packed flat in kraft paper sleeves with moisture-proof outer packaging.

name: Kraft Printed Cake Box
subTitle: Sturdy and Customizable Boxes for Eco-Conscious Brands

ü™∂ Light yet Durable ‚Äî Double-ply corrugated board with excellent compression strength

assurance.title: Damage-Free Delivery
assurance.desc: Boxes are packed flat with edge protectors to avoid warping in transit.

assurance.title: Eco-Friendly Commitment
assurance.desc: Made from FSC-certified kraft material with water-based adhesives.

assurance.title: Locally Manufactured
assurance.desc: Produced in India using kraft sourced from sustainable Indian mills.

industry: E-commerce, Gifts, Apparel, Cosmetics, Subscription Boxes

faqs.q: Are these boxes strong enough for shipping?
faqs.a: Yes. The 3-ply corrugated kraft is designed for light to medium shipping and performs well under pressure.

faqs.q: Can I get custom sizes or branding?
faqs.a: Absolutely. We offer custom sizes, die cuts, and 1-color printing for bulk orders. Contact us for more details.

faqs.q: Are the boxes delivered flat or assembled?
faqs.a: They are delivered flat (collapsed) to save space. Easy to fold and assemble without glue or tape.

faqs.q: Do you offer bulk pricing tiers?
faqs.a: Yes. We provide bulk discounts at 500 and 1000 unit slabs. Reach out to our sales team for a custom quote.

assurance.title: Reinforced Handle
assurance.desc: Twisted paper handles are glued with double patching for extra strength.

assurance.title: Eco-Friendly Materials
assurance.desc: No plastic. Made with recyclable paper and water-based adhesives.

assurance.desc: Locally produced to support sustainable Indian manufacturing.

faqs.q: Can I get branding or logo printed?
faqs.a: Yes. We support screen printing and block printing. MOQ applies. Customization may add 3‚Äì5 days to delivery timeline.

faqs.q: Are these bags reusable?
faqs.a: Yes. Many customers reuse them for multiple purposes, especially because of the durable handle and rigid structure.

faqs.q: How are the handles attached?
faqs.a: Handles are twisted paper ropes glued internally with double patching for strength.

faqs.q: Do these come in other colors?
faqs.a: Natural brown is standard. On request, white kraft and pastel finishes can be arranged for high-volume orders.
